divs: Sighting DetailsI was comming back from mexico flyng from huston to tampa maybe after about 20 minutes of depart i was talking with a person next to me to the right and to my left was my sister she was at the window the person next to me all of a sudden he notice this 4 things flyng besides the plane he said what is that are those parashutes we look and i see four whiteround things flyng at diferent distances and hights i stand up and put my face on the window to have a better look i focus on one of theme and it looks like big round thing surranded by an energy field like I still was tring to figure out what I was looking at ,thene I look down below the engine I saw something very well define it was like a cilinder ,octagonal like it was metal not shiny it was flyng very close to the engine I saw it very clear thene I relize that I was looking at a ufo I jump back to my sit very exited the guy next to me asked me what I saw ,I said to him do you belive in ? he said no and I said well that is what was out there he got a little scare and laid on his seat , my sister saw everything and she was very confuse, she was very quiet looking out tring to find explanations of course inside her parameters, I relize this experiance is a big one because confirm your belive, and Im very positive that this experiance was for me I can explain why ,well I hope by sharing this other people confirm this reality.
trends: there have been 18 other sightings in cms\tg n\a
there were no other sightings in cms\tg n\a on or around october 20th 2007
Summary: flyng from huston to tampa saw 4 round white things flyng besides plane a ship was below engine flyng very close
